subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: thanks for the reply frank
author: Lisby
full_text:
Steve, I've known Frank for about 4 years and I consider him a  
friend. He knows I stand behind him. I did before there were boxes  
and I will after there are boxes. I did EVP research for years--I got  
my first reel-to-reel from Sarah Estep's late husband if that dates  
me at all. So please don't mistake my good natured teasing of Frank  
for making demands on him. I know perfectly well that whatever  
happens will happen--or not--and I am perfectly at peace with that.

Ann

On Jul 15, 2007, at 1:50 AM, Steve Hultay wrote:

> I personally think begging for a box from Frank is probably just
> pissing him off. He will give a box to whom he feels is doing
> research on their own and deserves one being they already have a
> clientel on the other side without his help. This is just my
> opinion and i really don't mean to offend people, but everybody can
> try to say the right thing to persuade Frank, but he is looking for
> true researchers in ITC and not someone who just wants to have what
> nobody can make themself. It's just annoying seeing people everyday
> saying where's my box? There is plenty of research to do without it
> and capable people to build them too. Find them and stop begging on
> this board, this is not what it is for and i'm not speaking for
> Frank in any way. But i'd rather hear someone's Manual sweeps or
> something through EVP maker rather than groveling with no attempt to
> do anything for themselves. Just my take on it and i'm sorry if i
> pissed anybody off.
>
> -Steve H.
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
> >
> > Give one to Bruce before me, Frank. He's a great guy and he
> deserves
> > it a lot more; he's got more time for research and a lot of
> friends
> > on the others side he wants and needs to talk to.
> >
> > Ann
> >
> > On Jul 14, 2007, at 6:10 PM, bhali333 wrote:
> >
> > > hey Frank,
> > > thanks for the reply to my post. I am disabled from toxins I
> breathed
> > > at ground zero during rescue and recovery efforts, I was a first
> > > responder so we got the worst of it and it has left me with a
> lung
> > > disease and two heart attacks but I'm not handicaped I have total
> > > mobility I just have to take it easy. So as you may see I have
> alot of
> > > time for experimenting and have been doing evp research as well
> as itc
> > > for some time now and your box has touched a special cord with
> me it
> > > just feels like I should have and be using one. Don't ask me to
> > > explain
> > > it's just this wierd feeling like something is telling me you
> are
> > > meant
> > > to use this tool. If you can ever see your way clear as to
> building
> > > one
> > > for me I would be more than glad to pay for your time labor and
> > > materials and would be forever appreciative.
> > >
> > > your friend
> > > Bruce Halliday
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > Yahoo! Groups Links
> > >
> > >
> > >
> >
>
>
>
